price: 21. Of hebben zij goden van de aarde genomen die de doden laten herrijzen?
arabic: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَالِهَةٗ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُنشِرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: ami ittakhadhū ālihatan mina al-arḍi hum yunshirūna
